20110115040018.000|20110115040021.000|CC1|BEHIND BARS IN AMERICA.

20110115040022.000|20110115040024.000|CC1|GATES.                          
20110115040024.000|20110115040029.000|CC1|"LOCKUP."                       
20110115040029.000|20110115040030.000|CC1|>> I PRAY TO GOD THAT SOMEBODY  
20110115040030.000|20110115040033.000|CC1|RECOGNIZES WHAT'S GOING ON HERE.
20110115040033.000|20110115040034.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, WE IN HERE JUST       
20110115040034.000|20110115040038.000|CC1|ROTTING AWAY, YOU KNOW.         
20110115040038.000|20110115040038.000|CC1|>> TODAY WE HAVE ABOUT 756      
20110115040038.000|20110115040040.000|CC1|INMATES SERVING A LIFE SENTENCE 
20110115040040.000|20110115040046.000|CC1|HERE AT FOLSOM.                 
20110115040046.000|20110115040048.000|CC1|>> I WAS STATE RAISED, FEDERALLY
20110115040048.000|20110115040050.000|CC1|FUNDED.                         
20110115040050.000|20110115040051.000|CC1|>> WE'RE DEALING WITH MURDERERS 
20110115040051.000|20110115040052.000|CC1|AND RAPISTS, AND THAT'S ALWAYS  
20110115040052.000|20110115040055.000|CC1|IN THE BACK OF MY MIND.         
20110115040055.000|20110115040056.000|CC1|>> THEY TREAT US LIKE SLAVES    
20110115040056.000|20110115040057.000|CC1|NEWSPAPER HERE, MAN.            
20110115040057.000|20110115040059.000|CC1|>> SOMETIMES YOU'VE JUST GOT TO 
20110115040059.000|20110115040100.000|CC1|DO WHAT YOU'VE GOT TO DO, YOU   
20110115040100.000|20110115040100.000|CC1|KNOW, WHETHER YOU LIKE IT OR    
20110115040100.000|20110115040101.000|CC1|NOT.                            
20110115040101.000|20110115040102.000|CC1|>> A LOT OF TIMES THESE INMATES 
20110115040102.000|20110115040103.000|CC1|JUST DON'T GET ALONG WITH EACH  
20110115040103.000|20110115040103.000|CC1|OTHER.                          
20110115040103.000|20110115040104.000|CC1|THEY DIDN'T GET ALONG WITH      
20110115040104.000|20110115040105.000|CC1|PEOPLE ON THE OUTSIDE.          
20110115040105.000|20110115040106.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY THEY'RE HERE.        
20110115040106.000|20110115040110.000|CC1|>> THEY WERE STOMPING HIS HEAD. 
20110115040110.000|20110115040111.000|CC1|HE WENT OUT CODE THREE IN THE   
20110115040111.000|20110115040112.000|CC1|AMBULANCE, SEWS PRETTY MESSED   
20110115040112.000|20110115040113.000|CC1|UP.                             
20110115040113.000|20110115040114.000|CC1|>> WHAT YOU SEE HERE, IT'S LIKE 
20110115040114.000|20110115040115.000|CC1|THIS EVERY DAY.                 
20110115040115.000|20110115040116.000|CC1|>> IT'S THE WAY THEY LIVED ON   
20110115040116.000|20110115040116.000|CC1|THE STREETS SO THEY'RE LIVING IT
20110115040116.000|20110115040117.000|CC1|INSIDE THE WALL.                
20110115040117.000|20110115040118.000|CC1|>> USE YOUR IMAGINATION.        
20110115040118.000|20110115040119.000|CC1|ANYTHING THAT YOU CAN IMAGINE,  
20110115040119.000|20110115040120.000|CC1|THAT'S PROBABLY WHAT GOES ON    
20110115040120.000|20110115040123.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20110115040123.000|20110115040124.000|CC1|>> YOU WATCH HORROR MOVIES?     
20110115040124.000|20110115040124.000|CC1|THIS IS A HORROR MOVIE.         
20110115040124.000|20110115040125.000|CC1|>> I'M INNOCENT.                
20110115040125.000|20110115040136.000|CC1|I DIDN'T DO IT.                 
20110115040136.000|20110115040137.000|CC1|>> SINCE 1880, CALIFORNIA'S     
20110115040137.000|20110115040138.000|CC1|FOLSOM STATE PRISON HAS GAINED A
20110115040138.000|20110115040138.000|CC1|REPUTATION FOR VIOLENCE AND     
20110115040138.000|20110115040140.000|CC1|BLOOD SHED.                     
20110115040140.000|20110115040141.000|CC1|INMATES ONCE CALLED IT THE END  
20110115040141.000|20110115040143.000|CC1|OF THE WORLD.                   
20110115040143.000|20110115040144.000|CC1|IN DECEMBER OF 2002, THE        
20110115040144.000|20110115040146.000|CC1|PRISON'S WORST RIOT IN A DECADE 
20110115040146.000|20110115040147.000|CC1|BROKE OUT WITH ABOUT 100        
20110115040147.000|20110115040149.000|CC1|PRISONERS INVOLVED.             
20110115040149.000|20110115040150.000|CC1|DOZENS WERE HURT BEFORE THE     
20110115040150.000|20110115040152.000|CC1|MELEE ENDED WHEN A GUARD SHOT   
20110115040152.000|20110115040152.000|CC1|AND SERIOUSLY WOUNDED A         
20110115040152.000|20110115040155.000|CC1|PRISONER.                       
20110115040155.000|20110115040156.000|CC1|IT'S GRAPHIC EVIDENCE THAT      
20110115040156.000|20110115040200.000|CC1|KEEPING THE PEACE REMAINS A     
20110115040200.000|20110115040201.000|CC1|CHALLENGE INSIDE FOLSOM WITH    
20110115040201.000|20110115040201.000|CC1|OFFICERS OUTNUMBERED 90 TO 1.   
20110115040201.000|20110115040202.000|CC1|IN THIS HOUR, YOU'LL SEE WHAT'S 
20110115040202.000|20110115040204.000|CC1|BEING DONE TO MAINTAIN SAFETY   
20110115040204.000|20110115040205.000|CC1|AND HOW VIOLENCE SOMETIMES BOILS
20110115040205.000|20110115040211.000|CC1|OVER ANYWAY.                    
20110115040211.000|20110115040212.000|CC1|FOLSOM STATE PRISON IS LOCATED  
20110115040212.000|20110115040214.000|CC1|IN THE ROLLING HILLS OF NORTHERN
20110115040214.000|20110115040217.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA JUST EAST OF         
20110115040217.000|20110115040220.000|CC1|SACRAMENTO.                     
20110115040220.000|20110115040221.000|CC1|THE ORIGINAL STRUCTURES STILL   
20110115040221.000|20110115040222.000|CC1|STAND AS AN IMPOSING FORTRESS OF
20110115040222.000|20110115040224.000|CC1|SOLID GRANITE.                  
20110115040224.000|20110115040225.000|CC1|UP CLOSE, THE FIRST THING YOU   
20110115040225.000|20110115040227.000|CC1|NOTICE IS HOW OLD THE PRISON    
20110115040227.000|20110115040229.000|CC1|LOOKS.                          
20110115040229.000|20110115040233.000|CC1|LITTLE HAS CHANGED ABOUT THESE  
20110115040233.000|20110115040235.000|CC1|OLD STEEL DOORS.                
20110115040235.000|20110115040237.000|CC1|MANY OF THEM HUNG 120 YEARS AGO 
20110115040237.000|20110115040240.000|CC1|WHEN THE PRISON WAS STILL NEW.  
20110115040240.000|20110115040243.000|CC1|WALLS THAT SURROUND FOLSOM WERE 
20110115040243.000|20110115040246.000|CC1|BUILT 30 FEET INTO THE AIR AND  
20110115040246.000|20110115040247.000|CC1|15 FEET BELOW GROUND TO PREVENT 
20110115040247.000|20110115040250.000|CC1|TUNNELING.                      
20110115040250.000|20110115040251.000|CC1|IN THE EARLY YEARS, STATE       
20110115040251.000|20110115040252.000|CC1|DIGNITARIES WERE INVITED TO THE 
20110115040252.000|20110115040254.000|CC1|ANNUAL 4th OF JULY ACTIVITIES   
20110115040254.000|20110115040257.000|CC1|WHERE INMATES WERE PUT ON       
20110115040257.000|20110115040259.000|CC1|DISPLAY.                        
20110115040259.000|20110115040302.000|CC1|ON MOST OTHER DAYS, VIOLENCE    
20110115040302.000|20110115040303.000|CC1|RULED THIS YARD WHERE FIGHTS AND
20110115040303.000|20110115040304.000|CC1|STABBINGS WERE COMMON.          
20110115040304.000|20110115040305.000|CC1|EVEN THE WARDEN WAS STABBED TO  
20110115040305.000|20110115040307.000|CC1|DEATH BY A GROUP OF INMATES     
20110115040307.000|20110115040311.000|CC1|DURING A RIOT IN 1937.          
20110115040311.000|20110115040313.000|CC1|ORIGINALLY CONSTRUCTED TO       
20110115040313.000|20110115040315.000|CC1|RELIEVE OVERCROWDING AT SAN     
20110115040315.000|20110115040317.000|CC1|QUENTIN STATE PRISON, FOLSOM    
20110115040317.000|20110115040318.000|CC1|HOUSED SOME OF THE MOST         
20110115040318.000|20110115040324.000|CC1|DANGEROUS INMATES OF THE TIME.  
20110115040324.000|20110115040326.000|CC1|TODAY ITS HISTORY OF A MORE     
20110115040326.000|20110115040327.000|CC1|VIOLENT TIME HAS NOT BEEN       
20110115040327.000|20110115040329.000|CC1|FORGOTTEN.                      
20110115040329.000|20110115040330.000|CC1|>> FOLSOM, JUST THE AURA OF THIS
20110115040330.000|20110115040331.000|CC1|PLACE HANGS ABOVE US LIKE A FOG 
20110115040331.000|20110115040332.000|CC1|HANGS OVER THIS PLACE.          
20110115040332.000|20110115040334.000|CC1|>> DANIEL BELL IS A NEWCOMER,   
20110115040334.000|20110115040334.000|CC1|ONLY ON THE YARD FOR FOUR       
20110115040334.000|20110115040336.000|CC1|MONTHS.                         
20110115040336.000|20110115040337.000|CC1|>> I MEAN, YOU'RE LIKE TOTALLY  
20110115040337.000|20110115040339.000|CC1|IN AWE OF THE FACT THAT YOU'RE  
20110115040339.000|20110115040340.000|CC1|ACTUALLY HERE, AND SO MANY MEN  
20110115040340.000|20110115040342.000|CC1|HAVE DIED AND LOST THEIR LIVES  
20110115040342.000|20110115040343.000|CC1|ON THIS VERY YARD RIGHT HERE, AT
20110115040343.000|20110115040345.000|CC1|THE VERY SPOT WE'RE STANDING, I 
20110115040345.000|20110115040347.000|CC1|MEAN, YOU KNOW, MEN HAVE GOT    
20110115040347.000|20110115040347.000|CC1|KILLED, SO IT'S LIKE YOU'RE     
20110115040347.000|20110115040353.000|CC1|TERRIFIED.                      
20110115040353.000|20110115040354.000|CC1|>> THIS IS MY FIRST TIME HERE.  
20110115040354.000|20110115040354.000|CC1|DON'T LIKE IT.                  
20110115040354.000|20110115040357.000|CC1|I DON'T LIKE IT.                
20110115040357.000|20110115040358.000|CC1|>> A LOT OF PEOPLE GETTING      
20110115040358.000|20110115040400.000|CC1|STABBED, YOU KNOW.              
20110115040400.000|20110115040401.000|CC1|I'VE SEEN PEOPLE'S THROATS GET  
20110115040401.000|20110115040403.000|CC1|SLICED.                         
20110115040403.000|20110115040405.000|CC1|MY FIRST NIGHT IN THIS BUILDING 
20110115040405.000|20110115040407.000|CC1|BEHIND ME HERE, WHEN I WOKE UP  
20110115040407.000|20110115040419.000|CC1|IN THE MORNING TO GUNSHOTS AND  
20110115040419.000|20110115040426.000|CC1|ON THE TIER, YOU KNOW.          
20110115040426.000|20110115040427.000|CC1|>> YOU ALWAYS HAVE A FEAR FACTOR
20110115040427.000|20110115040428.000|CC1|WHEN YOU WALK THROUGH THOSE     
20110115040428.000|20110115040429.000|CC1|GATES.                          
20110115040429.000|20110115040430.000|CC1|ANYBODY WOULD BE LYING TO YOU IF
20110115040430.000|20110115040430.000|CC1|THEY TOLD YOU THAT THEY WEREN'T 
20110115040430.000|20110115040431.000|CC1|SCARED WHEN THEY WERE IN HERE.  
20110115040431.000|20110115040432.000|CC1|>> THERE'S NOT ANYONE WHO WALKS 
20110115040432.000|20110115040433.000|CC1|INTO FOLSOM THAT LOOKS AT THOSE 
20110115040433.000|20110115040434.000|CC1|GUN TOWERS, WHICH LOOKS LIKE A  
20110115040434.000|20110115040436.000|CC1|EUROPEAN CASTLE, THAT ISN'T     
20110115040436.000|20110115040437.000|CC1|SCARED.                         
20110115040437.000|20110115040438.000|CC1|>> DAVID BENNY TAYLOR IS 60     
20110115040438.000|20110115040440.000|CC1|YEARS OLD SERVING A LIFE        
20110115040440.000|20110115040442.000|CC1|SENTENCE FOR KIDNAPPING AND     
20110115040442.000|20110115040444.000|CC1|ROBBERY.                        
20110115040444.000|20110115040446.000|CC1|HE ENTERED FOLSOM PRISON IN 1975
20110115040446.000|20110115040447.000|CC1|WHEN IT WAS TERRORIZED BY       
20110115040447.000|20110115040448.000|CC1|SOPHISTICATED KILLERS AND GANGS.
20110115040448.000|20110115040450.000|CC1|>> THE STABBINGS HAVE BEEN      
20110115040450.000|20110115040451.000|CC1|NUMEROUS.                       
20110115040451.000|20110115040452.000|CC1|SOME OF THEM HAVE BEEN RIGHT IN 
20110115040452.000|20110115040454.000|CC1|FRONT OF ME.                    
20110115040454.000|20110115040457.000|CC1|AND WHEN YOU SEE A PERSON DIE,  
20110115040457.000|20110115040457.000|CC1|IT SORT OF MAKES A CHANGE IN YOU
20110115040457.000|20110115040458.000|CC1|FOREVER.                        
20110115040458.000|20110115040459.000|CC1|THE CHANGE MAKES YOU REALIZE HOW
20110115040459.000|20110115040500.000|CC1|TENUOUS LIFE IS AND HOW         
20110115040500.000|20110115040502.000|CC1|IMPORTANT LIFE IS AND HOW ONE   
20110115040502.000|20110115040503.000|CC1|MINUTE YOU CAN BE ALIVE AND THE 
20110115040503.000|20110115040505.000|CC1|NEXT MINUTE YOU CAN BE DEAD AND 
20110115040505.000|20110115040506.000|CC1|IT DOESN'T MATTER WHO YOU ARE.  
20110115040506.000|20110115040507.000|CC1|YOU CAN BE THE WARDEN OR YOU CAN
20110115040507.000|20110115040508.000|CC1|BE AN INFORMANT.                
20110115040508.000|20110115040509.000|CC1|EVERYTHING IN BETWEEN, YOU CAN  
20110115040509.000|20110115040510.000|CC1|BE ALIVE ONE MINUTE AND DEAD THE
20110115040510.000|20110115040510.000|CC1|NEXT MINUTE.                    
20110115040510.000|20110115040511.000|CC1|THAT'S SOMETHING YOU LEARN WHEN 
20110115040511.000|20110115040512.000|CC1|YOU SEE THE STABBINGS OCCUR     
20110115040512.000|20110115040513.000|CC1|AROUND YOU.                     
20110115040513.000|20110115040516.000|CC1|AND SOME OF THEM DIE.           
20110115040516.000|20110115040516.000|CC1|THE CODE REQUIRES THAT YOU ACT  
20110115040516.000|20110115040517.000|CC1|LIKE YOU DIDN'T SEE IT.         
20110115040517.000|20110115040518.000|CC1|>> I CAN RECALL THOSE DAYS      
20110115040518.000|20110115040519.000|CC1|VIVIDLY.                        
20110115040519.000|20110115040521.000|CC1|WE AVERAGE ANYWHERE FROM FOUR TO
20110115040521.000|20110115040521.000|CC1|SIX GUNSHOTS A DAY AT THIS      
20110115040521.000|20110115040525.000|CC1|PRISON.                         
20110115040525.000|20110115040525.000|CC1|AND YOU ARE CONSTANTLY CARRYING 
20110115040525.000|20110115040527.000|CC1|A GURNEY WITH A WOUNDED MAN ON  
20110115040527.000|20110115040528.000|CC1|IT, AND MANY TIMES THE MAN WAS  
20110115040528.000|20110115040530.000|CC1|DEAD.                           
20110115040530.000|20110115040531.000|CC1|>> LIEUTENANT TOM AYERS, A      
20110115040531.000|20110115040532.000|CC1|FORMER MARINE, HAS BEEN A       
20110115040532.000|20110115040533.000|CC1|CORRECTIONAL OFFICER AT FOLSOM  
20110115040533.000|20110115040535.000|CC1|FOR 21 YEARS.                   
20110115040535.000|20110115040537.000|CC1|>> WHEN STAFF COME IN HERE,     
20110115040537.000|20110115040540.000|CC1|ESPECIALLY OUR UNIFORMED        
20110115040540.000|20110115040542.000|CC1|OFFICERS, THEY ARE TAUGHT THE   
20110115040542.000|20110115040546.000|CC1|HISTORY OF THIS PRISON AND THE  
20110115040546.000|20110115040549.000|CC1|GREAT SACRIFICE OF THE PEOPLE   
20110115040549.000|20110115040552.000|CC1|WHO HAVE DIED HERE IN THE LINE  
20110115040552.000|20110115040554.000|CC1|OF DUTY, AND THEY ARE CONSTANTLY
20110115040554.000|20110115040556.000|CC1|REMINDED OF THAT.               
20110115040556.000|20110115040557.000|CC1|>> ANOTHER REMINDER OF FOLSOM'S 
20110115040557.000|20110115040558.000|CC1|GRIM PAST IS THE EXECUTION ROOM.
20110115040558.000|20110115040558.000|CC1|>> THE HANGING AREA WAS RIGHT   
20110115040558.000|20110115040559.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20110115040559.000|20110115040601.000|CC1|IN THE OLD DAYS WHAT THEY DID   
20110115040601.000|20110115040605.000|CC1|WAS THEY DID TURNS, DOWN BELOW  
20110115040605.000|20110115040606.000|CC1|US THERE ARE MORE CELLS.        
20110115040606.000|20110115040607.000|CC1|THEN YOU GOT THESE CELLS UP     
20110115040607.000|20110115040608.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20110115040608.000|20110115040609.000|CC1|YOU WORKED YOUR WAY UP TO THE   
20110115040609.000|20110115040610.000|CC1|VERY LAST CELL.                 
20110115040610.000|20110115040614.000|CC1|THAT WAS THE DEATH ROW CELL.    
20110115040614.000|20110115040615.000|CC1|>> OVER A PERIOD OF 40 YEARS, 93
20110115040615.000|20110115040617.000|CC1|MEN WERE HANGED AT FOLSOM, AND  
20110115040617.000|20110115040621.000|CC1|THE STAY ON DEATH ROW WAS BRIEF.
20110115040621.000|20110115040623.000|CC1|EACH CONDEMNED MAN WAITED FOR   
20110115040623.000|20110115040626.000|CC1|HIS TURN AT THE GALLOWS IN TINY 
20110115040626.000|20110115040628.000|CC1|CELLS ONLY A FEW FEET AWAY.     
20110115040628.000|20110115040629.000|CC1|>> AT THE VERY LAST CELL, YOUR  
20110115040629.000|20110115040632.000|CC1|DAY OF THE EXECUTION, THEY WOULD
20110115040632.000|20110115040633.000|CC1|COME IN, BASICALLY PUT METAL    
20110115040633.000|20110115040634.000|CC1|OVER THE DOORS SO YOU COULD NOT 
20110115040634.000|20110115040637.000|CC1|SEE IT.                         
20110115040637.000|20110115040638.000|CC1|THEY WOULD BRING THE GUY OUT.   
20110115040638.000|20110115040640.000|CC1|AND THEN HE WAS HUNG.           
20110115040640.000|20110115040641.000|CC1|THE INMATES IN THE CELLS COULD  
20110115040641.000|20110115040643.000|CC1|ONLY HEAR THE HANGING.          
20110115040643.000|20110115040644.000|CC1|THEY WERE NOT ALLOWED TO SEE THE
20110115040644.000|20110115040644.000|CC1|HANGING.                        
20110115040644.000|20110115040646.000|CC1|>> HEARING BUT NOT SEEING WHAT  
20110115040646.000|20110115040648.000|CC1|HAPPENS AROUND YOU IS A FACT OF 
20110115040648.000|20110115040649.000|CC1|PRISON LIFE THAT TORMENTS       
20110115040649.000|20110115040652.000|CC1|PRISONERS EVEN TODAY.           
20110115040652.000|20110115040654.000|CC1|>> IT'S NOT THE FEEL OF BEING   
20110115040654.000|20110115040657.000|CC1|INTIMIDATED BY ANOTHER PERSON.  
20110115040657.000|20110115040658.000|CC1|IT'S THE SOUNDS, THE MOVEMENTS, 
20110115040658.000|20110115040659.000|CC1|THE KEYS THAT RATTLE.           
20110115040659.000|20110115040701.000|CC1|THE SILENCE AT NIGHT.           
20110115040701.000|20110115040702.000|CC1|THE YELLS, THE SCREAMS.         
20110115040702.000|20110115040704.000|CC1|YOU WATCH HORROR MOVIES?        
20110115040704.000|20110115040705.000|CC1|THIS IS A HORROR MOVIE RIGHT    
20110115040705.000|20110115040709.000|CC1|HERE, AND WE LIVE IT EVERY DAY. 
20110115040709.000|20110115040711.000|CC1|>> MANY OF THE INMATES AT FOLSOM
20110115040711.000|20110115040712.000|CC1|ARE SERVING TIME FOR VIOLENT    
20110115040712.000|20110115040716.000|CC1|CRIMES.                         
20110115040716.000|20110115040717.000|CC1|OVER 700 ARE SERVING LIFE       
20110115040717.000|20110115040721.000|CC1|SENTENCES FOR MURDER.           
20110115040721.000|20110115040725.000|CC1|DUE TO THE HAZARDS PRESENTED BY 
20110115040725.000|20110115040727.000|CC1|ITS ARCHAIC DESIGN, FOLSOM NO   
20110115040727.000|20110115040728.000|CC1|LONGER QUALIFIES AS A LEVEL 4   
20110115040728.000|20110115040730.000|CC1|MAXIMUM SECURITY PRISON.        
20110115040730.000|20110115040732.000|CC1|THEREFORE, IT'S BEEN DOWNGRADED 
20110115040732.000|20110115040733.000|CC1|TO A LEVEL TWO MEDIUM SECURITY  
20110115040733.000|20110115040738.000|CC1|FACILITY.                       
20110115040738.000|20110115040739.000|CC1|>> A LEVEL TWO IS ONLY A        
20110115040739.000|20110115040740.000|CC1|CLASSIFICATION SCORE WITHIN TWO,
20110115040740.000|20110115040742.000|CC1|THREE SECONDS, THAT SAME        
20110115040742.000|20110115040743.000|CC1|INDIVIDUAL IN LEVEL TWO COULD

20110115041640.000|20110115041642.000|CC1|CONTROL UP TO 100, 200 CELL

20110115041655.000|20110115041657.000|CC1|UNLOCKED SEVERAL TIMES A DAY AS 
20110115041657.000|20110115041658.000|CC1|INMATES ARE RELEASED TO THE     
20110115041658.000|20110115041702.000|CC1|YARD.                           
20110115041702.000|20110115041704.000|CC1|TO DO SO, TWO STAFF OFFICERS    
20110115041704.000|20110115041707.000|CC1|SNAKE THEIR WAY THROUGH NARROW  
20110115041707.000|20110115041709.000|CC1|PASSAGEWAYS AND THE CENTRAL

20110115041713.000|20110115041714.000|CC1|IN THE PROCESS, THEY CAN FIND   
20110115041714.000|20110115041715.000|CC1|THEMSELVES SURROUNDED BY        
20110115041715.000|20110115041716.000|CC1|HUNDREDS OF INMATES.            
20110115041716.000|20110115041717.000|CC1|>> THERE'S TOO MANY INMATES OUT.
20110115041717.000|20110115041719.000|CC1|>> WE'RE JUST ON HOLD RIGHT NOW.

20110115043032.000|20110115043034.000|CC1|A MILITARY ADVISORY COMMITTEE   
20110115043034.000|20110115043036.000|CC1|SAYS IT'S TIME TO START         
20110115043036.000|20110115043037.000|CC1|INTEGRATING WOMEN INTO COMBAT   
20110115043037.000|20110115043037.000|CC1|UNITS.                          
20110115043037.000|20110115043040.000|CC1|THE PANEL OF RETIRED AND SERVING
20110115043040.000|20110115043042.000|CC1|MILITARY OFFICERS SAYS KEEPING

20110115043044.000|20110115043048.000|CC1|CREATES AN UNFAIR BARRIER TO    
20110115043048.000|20110115043048.000|CC1|PROMOTIONS.

20110115043048.000|20110115043051.000|CC1|>>> PLANS HAVE BEEN SCRAPPED FOR

20110115043102.000|20110115043107.000|CC1|>>> NOW BACK TO "LOCKUP."

20110115043107.000|20110115043108.000|CC1|>>> DUE TO MATURE SUBJECT

20110115043109.000|20110115043115.000|CC1|ADVISED.                        
20110115043115.000|20110115043911.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110115043115.000|20110115043116.000|CC1|>>> WELCOME BACK TO "LOCKUP."   
20110115043116.000|20110115043117.000|CC1|ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT       
20110115043117.000|20110115043118.000|CC1|ASPECTS OF PRISON LIFE IS TIME  
20110115043118.000|20110115043120.000|CC1|SPENT IN THE YARD.              
20110115043120.000|20110115043122.000|CC1|AT FOLSOM STATE PRISON IN       
20110115043122.000|20110115043123.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA, OVER 1,000 INMATES  
20110115043123.000|20110115043124.000|CC1|CAN BE ON THE YARD AT ANY GIVEN 
20110115043124.000|20110115043126.000|CC1|TIME.                           
20110115043126.000|20110115043128.000|CC1|IT'S A CENTRAL MEETING PLACE    
20110115043128.000|20110115043129.000|CC1|WHERE PRISONERS WORK OUT THEIR  
20110115043129.000|20110115043130.000|CC1|AGGRESSIONS AND INTERACT WITH   
20110115043130.000|20110115043131.000|CC1|OTHER INMATES.                  
20110115043131.000|20110115043134.000|CC1|BUT IT'S ALSO THE FLASH POINT   
20110115043134.000|20110115043140.000|CC1|WHEN VIOLENCE BREAKS OUT AS     
20110115043140.000|20110115043143.000|CC1|WITNESSED WHILE MSNBC'S CAMERAS 
20110115043143.000|20110115043145.000|CC1|WERE IN YARD.                   
20110115043145.000|20110115043146.000|CC1|>> STATE RAISED, FEDERALLY      
20110115043146.000|20110115043149.000|CC1|FUNDED.                         
20110115043149.000|20110115043151.000|CC1|>> TREAT US LIKE SLAVES UP IN   
20110115043151.000|20110115043152.000|CC1|HERE, MAN.                      
20110115043152.000|20110115043153.000|CC1|>> YOU SEE AROUND HERE, IT'S    
20110115043153.000|20110115043154.000|CC1|LIKE THIS EVERY DAY.            
20110115043154.000|20110115043155.000|CC1|>> SEEING PEOPLE, YOU KNOW,     
20110115043155.000|20110115043156.000|CC1|GETTING SHOT, YOU KNOW, KILLED, 
20110115043156.000|20110115043157.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, RIOTS.                
20110115043157.000|20110115043158.000|CC1|AND, YOU KNOW, MELEES AND STUFF 
20110115043158.000|20110115043202.000|CC1|LIKE THAT.                      
20110115043202.000|20110115043203.000|CC1|LIKE IF YOU GET SOMEBODY THAT'S 
20110115043203.000|20110115043203.000|CC1|BEEN AN INFORMANT FROM YOUR     
20110115043203.000|20110115043205.000|CC1|COUNTY OR CHILD MOLESTER OR     
20110115043205.000|20110115043206.000|CC1|SOMETHING, SOMEBODY IN YOUR CAR,
20110115043206.000|20110115043207.000|CC1|THAT'S YOUR COUNTY, YOU KNOW,   
20110115043207.000|20110115043208.000|CC1|YOUR LOCAL PEOPLE, YOU KNOW,    
20110115043208.000|20110115043209.000|CC1|THAT ARE HERE IN PRISON, YOU'VE 
20110115043209.000|20110115043210.000|CC1|GOT TO HANDLE IT, SOMEBODY'S GOT
20110115043210.000|20110115043212.000|CC1|TO HANDLE IT OR THE WHOLE CAR IS
20110115043212.000|20110115043213.000|CC1|SHUNNED.                        
20110115043213.000|20110115043214.000|CC1|YOUR WHOLE CAR WILL BE PUT ON   
20110115043214.000|20110115043220.000|CC1|SHINE, YOU KNOW, ON LAME STATUS.
20110115043220.000|20110115043221.000|CC1|>> BECAUSE FOLSOM'S YARD IS THE 
20110115043221.000|20110115043225.000|CC1|SMALLEST PRISON YARD IN THE     
20110115043225.000|20110115043227.000|CC1|STATE, NO ONE IS SEGREGATED.    
20110115043227.000|20110115043228.000|CC1|MEMBERS OF THE VARIOUS PRISON   
20110115043228.000|20110115043230.000|CC1|GANGS WHO ARE KNOWN TO BE       
20110115043230.000|20110115043233.000|CC1|ENEMIES ARE FORCED TO WALK      
20110115043233.000|20110115043234.000|CC1|AMONGST EACH OTHER.             
20110115043234.000|20110115043235.000|CC1|>> IF I COULD DESCRIBE IT AND   
20110115043235.000|20110115043237.000|CC1|SUM IT UP IN ONE WORD, I WOULD  
20110115043237.000|20110115043241.000|CC1|SAY IT'S LIKE A BIG TOILET

20110115043309.000|20110115043310.000|CC1|PROMOTING THAT TYPE OF RACIST

20110115043314.000|20110115043319.000|CC1|VOLATILE SITUATION HERE.        
20110115043319.000|20110115043320.000|CC1|>> OH, YOU CAN FEEL IT.         
20110115043320.000|20110115043321.000|CC1|IT'S LIKE ELECTRICITY IN THE    
20110115043321.000|20110115043322.000|CC1|AIR.                            
20110115043322.000|20110115043323.000|CC1|IT'S SO THICK YOU CAN ACTUALLY

20110115043327.000|20110115043330.000|CC1|YOU WANT TO PUT YOURSELF AGAINST
20110115043330.000|20110115043331.000|CC1|THE WALL OR PUT SOMEBODY BEHIND 
20110115043331.000|20110115043332.000|CC1|YOU THAT YOU CAN TRUST OR JUST  
20110115043332.000|20110115043335.000|CC1|STAY OFF IN A CORNER.           
20110115043335.000|20110115043336.000|CC1|>> IN THE BLINK OF AN EYE, THAT 
20110115043336.000|20110115043338.000|CC1|MUCH TIME, IT CAN CHANGE.       
20110115043338.000|20110115043339.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY OUR STAFF IS OUT HERE
20110115043339.000|20110115043341.000|CC1|WATCHING, INTERACTING AND

20110115043436.000|20110115043437.000|CC1|ARE PROBABLY EARLY 20s, LATE

20110115043503.000|20110115043504.000|CC1|>> AS LONG AS YOU HAVE STREET

20110115043534.000|20110115043535.000|CC1|AND BASICALLY IT'S BECAUSE      
20110115043535.000|20110115043536.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT THEY LOOK UP TO.    
20110115043536.000|20110115043537.000|CC1|>> THE INMATE WHO WAS ATTACKED  
20110115043537.000|20110115043538.000|CC1|WILL SURVIVE BECAUSE OF QUICK   
20110115043538.000|20110115043538.000|CC1|RESPONSE FROM PRISON STAFF ON   
20110115043538.000|20110115043539.000|CC1|THE YARD.                       
20110115043539.000|20110115043542.000|CC1|>> THEY COMPLY TO YOUR ORDERS,  
20110115043542.000|20110115043542.000|CC1|THEY GET DOWN, YOU CUFF THEM,   
20110115043542.000|20110115043544.000|CC1|BRING THEM TO THE CUSTODY

20110115043547.000|20110115043548.000|CC1|THERE.                          
20110115043548.000|20110115043549.000|CC1|IF NOT, SOMETIMES FORCE IS USED,
20110115043549.000|20110115043550.000|CC1|BATON, PEPPER SPRAY.            
20110115043550.000|20110115043551.000|CC1|IN THIS SITUATION, THERE WAS NO 
20110115043551.000|20110115043556.000|CC1|WEAPONS INVOLVED, THEREFORE, THE
20110115043556.000|20110115043557.000|CC1|GUNNERS DIDN'T HAVE A REASON TO 
20110115043557.000|20110115043558.000|CC1|SHOOT.                          
20110115043558.000|20110115043559.000|CC1|>> THE TWO INMATES RESPONSIBLE  
20110115043559.000|20110115043601.000|CC1|FOR THE ATTACK WERE FOUND GUILTY
20110115043601.000|20110115043602.000|CC1|OF BATTERY AND RECEIVED 180 DAYS
20110115043602.000|20110115043605.000|CC1|ADDED TO THEIR SENTENCES.       
20110115043605.000|20110115043607.000|CC1|ANY TIME PRISONERS ARE INVOLVED 
20110115043607.000|20110115043609.000|CC1|IN ASSAULTS WITH OTHER INMATES  
20110115043609.000|20110115043613.000|CC1|OR STAFF, THEY ARE PLACED IN    
20110115043613.000|20110115043614.000|CC1|ADMINISTRATIVE SEGREGATION OR AD
20110115043614.000|20110115043618.000|CC1|SEG.                            
20110115043618.000|20110115043619.000|CC1|OFFICER JEREMY BACKART WORKS ON 
20110115043619.000|20110115043622.000|CC1|AD SEG WHERE INMATES ARE LOCKED 
20110115043622.000|20110115043623.000|CC1|DOWN AND WATCHED 23 HOURS A DAY,
20110115043623.000|20110115043624.000|CC1|7 DAYS A WEEK.                  
20110115043624.000|20110115043625.000|CC1|>> YOU ALWAYS HAVE TO STAY      
20110115043625.000|20110115043626.000|CC1|ALERT.                          
20110115043626.000|20110115043627.000|CC1|YOU NEVER KNOW WHAT AN INMATE IS
20110115043627.000|20110115043628.000|CC1|DOING.                          
20110115043628.000|20110115043629.000|CC1|YOU NEVER KNOW WHAT HE'S        
20110115043629.000|20110115043630.000|CC1|THINKING.                       
20110115043630.000|20110115043631.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY YOU HAVE PARTNERS.   
20110115043631.000|20110115043632.000|CC1|YOUR PARTNER WATCHES WHAT YOU'RE
20110115043632.000|20110115043634.000|CC1|DOING AND YOU'RE WATCHING WHAT  
20110115043634.000|20110115043635.000|CC1|YOUR PARTNER IS DOING FOR       
20110115043635.000|20110115043636.000|CC1|PROTECTION.                     
20110115043636.000|20110115043638.000|CC1|ANY TIME AN INMATE COMES OUT OF 
20110115043638.000|20110115043642.000|CC1|THE CELL, HE HAS TO BE          
20110115043642.000|20110115043642.000|CC1|STRIP-SEARCHED, HANDCUFFED AND  
20110115043642.000|20110115043644.000|CC1|ESCORTED WITH TWO OFFICERS.     
20110115043644.000|20110115043645.000|CC1|>> FOR THEIR OWN PROTECTION, ALL
20110115043645.000|20110115043647.000|CC1|CORRECTIONAL STAFF ARE REQUIRED 
20110115043647.000|20110115043649.000|CC1|TO WEAR PROTECTIVE GEAR WHILE   
20110115043649.000|20110115043653.000|CC1|WORKING IN THE AD SEG UNIT.     
20110115043653.000|20110115043655.000|CC1|>> THE FACE SHIELD IS WORN TO   
20110115043655.000|20110115043658.000|CC1|PROTECT US AGAINST POSSIBLE     
20110115043658.000|20110115043703.000|CC1|GASSING WHEN INMATES THROW URINE
20110115043703.000|20110115043704.000|CC1|OR FECES AT THE OFFICERS.       
20110115043704.000|20110115043707.000|CC1|THIS IS A BATON.                
20110115043707.000|20110115043708.000|CC1|IT'S USED TO ESCORT INMATES WHEN
20110115043708.000|20110115043709.000|CC1|WE TAKE THEM OUTSIDE THE        
20110115043709.000|20110115043711.000|CC1|BUILDING.                       
20110115043711.000|20110115043711.000|CC1|THE INMATE THAT'S ESCORTED IS   
20110115043711.000|20110115043712.000|CC1|HANDCUFFED.                     
20110115043712.000|20110115043713.000|CC1|HE CAN'T PROTECT HIMSELF.       
20110115043713.000|20110115043714.000|CC1|IF OTHER INMATES ARE GOING TO   
20110115043714.000|20110115043715.000|CC1|JUMP HIM, WE HAVE TO PROTECT    
20110115043715.000|20110115043717.000|CC1|HIM.                            
20110115043717.000|20110115043718.000|CC1|THE PROTECTIVE GLOVES WE WEAR IN
20110115043718.000|20110115043719.000|CC1|CASE WE COME IN CONTACT WITH    
20110115043719.000|20110115043720.000|CC1|BLOOD OR OTHER BODILY FLUIDS    
20110115043720.000|20110115043723.000|CC1|WHEN WE'RE SEARCHING A HOUSE OR 
20110115043723.000|20110115043724.000|CC1|IF THE INMATE HAS IT ON HIM WHEN
20110115043724.000|20110115043725.000|CC1|WE TOUCH HIM.                   
20110115043725.000|20110115043727.000|CC1|WE ALSO WEAR A PROTECTIVE VEST  
20110115043727.000|20110115043732.000|CC1|WHERE IT'S STABPROOF.           
20110115043732.000|20110115043733.000|CC1|INMATES WILL USE ELASTIC OUT OF 
20110115043733.000|20110115043734.000|CC1|THEIR WAISTBANDS FROM THEIR     
20110115043734.000|20110115043735.000|CC1|BOXERS AND CAN USE IT LIKE A    
20110115043735.000|20110115043736.000|CC1|BUNGEE AND SHOOT METAL OBJECTS  
20110115043736.000|20110115043737.000|CC1|OUT AT US IF THEY'RE ABLE TO GET
20110115043737.000|20110115043739.000|CC1|AHOLD OF IT.                    
20110115043739.000|20110115043741.000|CC1|>> ADMINISTRATIVE SEGREGATION IS
20110115043741.000|20110115043743.000|CC1|NOT THE ONLY AREA OF FOLSOM     
20110115043743.000|20110115043750.000|CC1|WHERE OFFICERS ARE AT RISK.     
20110115043750.000|20110115043753.000|CC1|>> I HAVE BEEN IN ON PROBABLY   
20110115043753.000|20110115043753.000|CC1|ABOUT TWO DOZEN CELL EXTRACTIONS
20110115043753.000|20110115043754.000|CC1|TO WHERE I'VE HAD PEOPLE JUMP ON
20110115043754.000|20110115043755.000|CC1|MY BACK WHEN WE ARE GOING IN AND
20110115043755.000|20110115043758.000|CC1|TRYING TO GET THEM.

20110115044827.000|20110115044828.000|CC1|WIFE, BARBARA, IS ALLOWED TO    
20110115044828.000|20110115044828.000|CC1|VISIT.                          
20110115044828.000|20110115044829.000|CC1|>> WE MET THROUGH A FRIEND.     
20110115044829.000|20110115044830.000|CC1|>> MY BEST FRIEND.              
20110115044830.000|20110115044831.000|CC1|WHO WAS -- THEY WERE IN THE SAME
20110115044831.000|20110115044832.000|CC1|COUNTY JAIL TOGETHER, AND THEY  
20110115044832.000|20110115044834.000|CC1|WERE WRITING.                   
20110115044834.000|20110115044837.000|CC1|SHE GAVE HIM MY ADDRESS TO WRITE
20110115044837.000|20110115044838.000|CC1|TO HER, AND I KEPT GETTING THESE
20110115044838.000|20110115044840.000|CC1|LETTERS AND I SENT THEM ON TO   
20110115044840.000|20110115044841.000|CC1|HER.                            
20110115044841.000|20110115044843.000|CC1|BUT I GOT THESE REALLY GOOD     
20110115044843.000|20110115044844.000|CC1|VIBES FROM THESE LETTERS.       
20110115044844.000|20110115044845.000|CC1|AND I HAVE NEVER WRITTEN A      
20110115044845.000|20110115044846.000|CC1|STRANGER IN MY LIFE, AND I WROTE
20110115044846.000|20110115044848.000|CC1|HIM.                            
20110115044848.000|20110115044849.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, WE JUST WROTE BACK AND
20110115044849.000|20110115044855.000|CC1|FORTH.                          
20110115044855.000|20110115044858.000|CC1|>> THEN WE FINALLY PUT IN FOR AN
20110115044858.000|20110115044900.000|CC1|APPLICATION FOR VISITING.       
20110115044900.000|20110115044901.000|CC1|>> IT TOOK ME EIGHT MONTHS TO   
20110115044901.000|20110115044902.000|CC1|GET CLEARED.                    
20110115044902.000|20110115044903.000|CC1|>> IT'S A LONG PROCESS TO GET

20110115045643.000|20110115045645.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT'S TOUGH ABOUT BEING

20110115045647.000|20110115045651.000|CC1|THE SAME DAY IN, DAY OUT.       
20110115045651.000|20110115045652.000|CC1|BASICALLY YOUR PROGRAM DOESN'T

20110115045724.000|20110115045725.000|CC1|WATCHING THIS ARE GOING TO LOOK

20110115045725.000|20110115045726.000|CC1|LIKE CRIMINALS.

20110115045727.000|20110115045728.000|CC1|GUY.                            
20110115045728.000|20110115045729.000|CC1|HE HAS INK ALL OVER HIM, YOU
